Package org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.rest.model.json

Class TreePolicyRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.rest.model.json.PolicyRequest
      • org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.rest.model.json.TreePolicyRequest
  • public final class TreePolicyRequest
extends PolicyRequest
    A policy request that takes a single resource and is used to render policy decisions for that resource and for all policies that match sub-resources of that resource.
    Since:
    12.0.0
